mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cafe (userNum, cafeName, cafeTel, cafeOwner, cafeIntro, sido, sigungu, bname, roadAddr, normAddr, buildName, detailAddr, bCode, cafeOpen, cafeClose) VALUES(#{userNum}, #{cafeName}, #{cafeTel}, #{cafeOwner}, #{cafeIntro}, #{sido}, #{sigungu}, #{bname}, #{roadAddr}, #{normAddr}, #{buildName}, #{detailAddr}, #{bCode}, #{cafeOpen}, #{cafeClose})
